title: Will Riot Do Something About this?
body:
Unsure if this posted the first time as its not appearing :/ 
Just got out of a ranked game in which i had a soraka support hellbent on losing the game so she can go to B5, will riot ever do anything about these people. i reported and so did a few others, but as we all know, Unless you say a naughty word its fine............. 

(as much as i wanted to cuss him out i didn't as i am reformed after losing my old account)

replies.body: It's a shame since most of their player base is lower elo, :/

It's typically the bronze mindset, and sadly there's not much you can do except report and pray to Riot action gets taken.
You know what they say but, if you want something stop at nothing to do it. Keep improving and maybe a feeding Soraka won't be an issue.

I reported somebody for doing this and he stopped playing a few days after. it seems he was banned. so yes, riot is doing something about it.

you need to make sure to report them and specify the reason in the report.

what is the deal with so many people deranking???

it seems the streams and youtube channels "from bronze to diamond" went popular, i dont know, this is getting out of control
